SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into rc_buyer_trade (AMOUNT, BALANCE, TYPE, ORDER_ID, CREATE_TIME, BUYER_ID, PAYMENT_TYPE, PAYMENT_INTERFACE) values (#{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{buyerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paymentType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{paymentInterface,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update:
update rc_buyer_trade
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BALANCE = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BUYER_ID = #{buyerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PAYMENT_TYPE = #{paymentType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PAYMENT_INTERFACE = #{paymentInterface,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where BUYER_TRADE_ID = #{buyerTradeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select BUYER_TRADE_ID, AMOUNT, BALANCE, TYPE, ORDER_ID, CREATE_TIME, BUYER_ID, PAYMENT_TYPE, PAYMENT_INTERFACE from rc_buyer_trade where BUYER_TRADE_ID = #{buyerTradeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
